record.field: ('Invoice' if obj.name != '/' else 'Draft Invoice') + ('_' + obj.partner_id.display_name if obj.partner_id.display_name else '') + ('_' + obj.name if obj.name else '') + ('_' + datetime.strftime(obj.invoice_date, "%d-%m-%Y") if obj.invoice_date else '')

result = cell(A4) + ' ' + cell(O31) +'\n' + cell(P31) + ' ' + cell(N4) + ' ' + cell(R31) +'\n' + cell(S31)
